techmeme.title: A live blog of OpenAI DevDay 2025, where the company is expected to announce a visual agent builder and other developer updates (Ashley Capoot/CNBC)
Coupa, a Thoma Bravo-owned supply chain tech company, acquires procurement tech startup Scoutbee, with the deal expected to close by the end of October (Colin Campbell/Axios)
The DOJ and Google wrap up a two-week remedies hearing in the US v. Google ad tech trial; both sides will offer closing arguments in November (New York Times)
Deloitte announces a deal to roll out Anthropic's Claude to more than 470,000 of its employees globally, marking Anthropic's largest enterprise deployment ever (Ashley Capoot/CNBC)
As part of the OpenAI-AMD deal, OpenAI will receive the first GW worth of AMD's Instinct MI450 chips in H2 2026, when the new chip is scheduled for deployment (Rebecca Bellan/TechCrunch)
